Author: rqrqsj
Text: Hey, thanks for bringing logic into this. I read your comment yesterday but was too emotional to respond still. I needed it, reading back I was clearly panicking, not thinking clearly. The amount I ate, in consideration with everything you said, really wasn’t a binge. I was just already upset and watching myself finish a big meal of course made me more upset when it wouldn’t have so much otherwise.   Anyways thanks! I feel a lot better and this comment helped a lot.

Author: Renlywinsthethrone
Text: I know it's hard, and ED brain says to eat as few calories as possible, but it will be helpful for you both right now and in the long run to fight thinking of 1200 calories as binging, especially when it's been a day since you last ate. You ate (based on your height) probably about as much as your body needs a day. You had a rough day, and you were drained, and you refilled your body just the right amount, and that's it, and that's okay.
